summary.span: 實作基本資料傳輸機制。

span.span: Implements a basic data transfer mechanism.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作介面，其方法提供的資料傳輸格式無關的機制。 implements the interface, whose methods provide a format-independent mechanism for data transfer. A通常會與搭配和拖放作業中。A is typically used with the and in drag-and-drop operations. 類別提供的建議的實作介面。The class provides the recommended implementation of the interface. 建議您改用類別，而不是實作自己。It is suggested that you use the class rather than implementing yourself. 多個以不同格式的資料片段可以儲存在。Multiple pieces of data in different formats can be stored in a . 資料擷取自由其相關的格式。Data is retrieved from a by its associated format. 因為可能不知道目標應用程式，您可以增加的可能性，資料會以適當的格式為應用程式中的資料放入多種格式。Because the target application might not be known, you can increase the likelihood that the data will be in the appropriate format for an application by placing the data in a in multiple formats. 請參閱之預先定義的格式。See for the predefined formats. 您可以實作您自己的格式建立的執行個體類別。You can implement your own format by creating an instance of the class. 若要將資料儲存在，將資料傳遞至建構函式或呼叫。To store data in a , pass the data to the constructor or call . 您可以將資料以多種格式加入相同。You can add data in multiple formats to the same . 如果您要的資料加入其原生格式，呼叫中擷取與`autoConvert`參數設定為`false`。If you want the data you add to be retrieved in its native format only, call with the `autoConvert` parameter set to `false`. 資料可以從擷取與相容的所有格式。Data can be retrieved from a in any format which is compatible with . 例如，文字可以轉換成 Unicode。For example, text can be converted to Unicode. 若要擷取已儲存的格式中的資料，請呼叫與`autoConvert`參數設定為`false`。To retrieve data in the format in which it was stored, call with the `autoConvert` parameter set to `false`. 若要判斷資料儲存在何種格式，請呼叫。To determine what formats the data is stored in, call . 若要判斷是否有可用的格式，請呼叫與所需的格式。To determine if a format is available, call with the desired format. 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]、類別會提供額外的方法可讓您更輕鬆地使用資料共通的格式。In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the class provides additional methods that make it easier to work with data in common formats. 若要加入至特定格式的資料，使用適當`Set`*格式*方法，例如。To add data of a particular format to the , use the appropriate `Set`*Format* method, such as . 若要擷取資料，從特定格式的，第一次呼叫適當`Contains`*格式*方法 (例如) 來判斷是否包含資料格式，然後呼叫適當`Get`*格式*方法 (例如) 來擷取資料，如果包含它。To retrieve data of a particular format from the , first call the appropriate `Contains`*Format* method (such as ) to determine whether the contains data in that format, then call the appropriate `Get`*Format* method (such as ) to retrieve the data if the contains it. > [!NOTE] > 使用剪貼簿的中繼檔格式時，可能需要特殊考量。Special considerations may be necessary when using the metafile format with the Clipboard. 因為在目前的實作限制類別，.NET Framework 所使用的中繼檔格式可能無法辨識的應用程式使用較舊的中繼檔格式。Due to a limitation in the current implementation of the class, the metafile format used by the .NET Framework may not be recognized by applications that use an older metafile format. 在此情況下，您必須與 Win32 剪貼簿應用程式開發介面 (Api) 的互通。In this case, you must interoperate with the Win32 Clipboard application programming interfaces (APIs). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 323530，"中繼檔上剪貼簿是不可見到所有應用程式 」 在 Microsoft 知識庫文件在http://support.microsoft.com。For more information, see article 323530, "Metafiles on Clipboard Are Not Visible to All Applications," in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com. > > 物件必須可序列化，才能放在剪貼簿上。An object must be serializable for it to be put on the Clipboard. 請參閱如需詳細資訊，在序列化。See for more information on serialization. 如果您的目標應用程式需要非常特定的資料格式，標頭加入至資料的序列化處理序可能會禁止應用程式無法辨識您的資料。If your target application requires a very specific data format, the headers added to the data in the serialization process may prevent the application from recognizing your data. 若要保留您的資料格式，將加入資料做為陣列並傳遞至方法。To preserve your data format, add your data as a array to a and pass the to the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將資料中的。The following code example adds data in a . 首先，新建立元件會儲存在它。First, a new is created and a component is stored in it. 然後，它會檢查中是否有適當的型別中的資料存在。Then, it checks to see if data in the appropriate type exists in the . 結果會顯示在文字方塊中。The result is displayed in a text box. 此程式碼需要`textBox1`已建立。This code requires that `textBox1` has been created. [!code-cpp[Classic DataObject Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataObject Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DataObject Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataObject Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DataObject Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataObject Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下一個範例會擷取儲存在資料。The next example retrieves the data stored in a . 首先，新建立文字資料。First, a new is created with text data. 然後，擷取的資料，指定其格式為字串，並顯示在文字方塊中。Then, the data is retrieved, specifying its format as a string, and displayed in a text box. 資料格式會自動從文字轉換成字串。The data format is automatically converted from text to string. 此程式碼需要`textBox1`已建立。This code requires that `textBox1` has been created. [!code-cpp[Classic DataObject Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataObject Example/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic DataObject Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataObject Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic DataObject Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataObject Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個方法在指定的格式中找不到資料，它會嘗試將資料轉換成的格式。If this method cannot find data in the specified format, it attempts to convert the data to the format. 如果資料無法轉換成指定的格式，或是儲存資料時自動轉換設定為`false`，這個方法會傳回`null`。If the data cannot be converted to the specified format, or if the data was stored with automatic conversion set to `false`, this method returns `null`. 若要判斷資料是否相關，或可以轉換成格式，請呼叫之前先呼叫。To determine whether data is associated with, or can be converted to, a format, call before calling . 呼叫的有效資料的格式儲存在這個清單。Call for a list of valid formats for the data stored in this . > [!NOTE] > 資料可以轉換成其他格式，如果儲存時指定，允許轉換，而且要求的格式與預存格式相容。Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format. 例如，資料儲存為 Unicode 可以轉換成文字。For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text. > > 當`format`是，這個方法傳回 utf-8 編碼字串的目標.NET 4.5 或更新版本，應用程式中，使用 ANSI 編碼的字串，在應用程式中的對目標為.NET 4.0 或更低。When `format` is , this method returns a UTF-8 encoded string in applications that target .NET 4.5 or higher, and an ANSI encoded string in applications that target .NET 4.0 or lower. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會擷取儲存在資料。The following code example retrieves the data stored in a . 首先，新建立文字資料。First, a new is created with text data. 然後，擷取的資料，指定其格式為字串，並顯示在文字方塊中。Then, the data is retrieved, specifying its format as a string, and displayed in a text box. 此程式碼需要`textBox1`已建立。This code requires that `textBox1` has been created. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`autoConvert`參數是`true`而且這個方法在指定的格式中找不到資料，它會嘗試將資料轉換成的格式。If the `autoConvert` parameter is `true` and this method cannot find data in the specified format, it attempts to convert the data to the format. 如果資料無法轉換成指定的格式，或是儲存資料時自動轉換設定為`false`，這個方法會傳回`null`。If the data cannot be converted to the specified format, or if the data was stored with the automatic conversion set to `false`, this method returns `null`. 如果`autoConvert`參數是`false`，這個方法會傳回資料中指定的格式，或`null`如果找不到沒有此格式的資料。If the `autoConvert` parameter is `false`, this method returns data in the specified format, or `null` if no data in this format can be found. 若要判斷資料是否相關，或可以轉換成格式，請呼叫之前先呼叫。To determine whether data is associated with, or can be converted to, a format, call before calling . 呼叫的有效資料的格式儲存在這個清單。Call for a list of valid formats for the data stored in this . > [!NOTE] > 資料可以轉換成其他格式，如果儲存時指定，允許轉換，而且要求的格式與預存格式相容。Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format. 例如，資料儲存為 Unicode 可以轉換成文字。For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text. > > 當`format`是，這個方法傳回 utf-8 編碼字串的目標.NET 4.5 或更新版本，應用程式中，使用 ANSI 編碼的字串，在應用程式中的對目標為.NET 4.0 或更低。When `format` is , this method returns a UTF-8 encoded string in applications that target .NET 4.5 or higher, and an ANSI encoded string in applications that target .NET 4.0 or lower. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會擷取儲存在資料，並使用`autoConvert`參數來指定是否要轉換的資料格式。The following code example retrieves the data stored in a , using the `autoConvert` parameter to specify whether to convert the data format. 首先，新建立文字資料。First, a new is created with text data. 然後這個範例會擷取資料，並指定其格式的字串，並沒有格式轉換時，也就是為`autoConvert`參數是`false`。Then the example tries to retrieve the data, specifying its format as a string and no format conversion, that is, the `autoConvert` parameter is `false`. 這項作業會失敗，因為沒有字串資料中的。This operation fails because there is no string data in the . 接下來，範例會嘗試擷取資料，與`autoConvert`參數設定為`true`。Next, the example tries to retrieve the data again, with the `autoConvert` parameter set to `true`. 這項作業成功，而且結果會顯示在。This operation succeeds and the results are displayed in a . 此程式碼需要`textBox1`已建立。This code requires that `textBox1` has been created. remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫此方法以判斷格式是否存在然後才呼叫。Call this method to determine whether a format exists before calling . 呼叫的格式，可在此。Call for the formats that are available in this . 這個方法會傳回`true`時：This method returns `true` when: - `autoConvert`參數是`true`且資料在可以轉換成適當格式的格式。The `autoConvert` parameter is `true` and the data is in a format that can be converted to the appropriate format. - `autoConvert`參數是`false`且資料在適當的格式。The `autoConvert` parameter is `false` and the data is in the appropriate format. 這個方法會傳回`false`時：This method returns `false` when: - `autoConvert`參數是`true`和這個方法中指定的格式，找不到資料並不能在資料轉換成指定的格式，或儲存資料時自動轉換設定為`false`。The `autoConvert` parameter is `true` and this method cannot find data in the specified format, and it cannot convert data to the specified format, or the data was stored with automatic conversion set to `false`. - `autoConvert`參數是`false`和資料不存在於這中指定的格式。The `autoConvert` parameter is `false` and data does not exist in this in the specified format. > [!NOTE] > 資料可以轉換成其他格式，如果它是預存指定允許轉換，以及要求的格式是否與預存格式相容。Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format. 例如，資料儲存為 Unicode 可以轉換成文字。For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text. > [!NOTE] > 如果可以不擷取任何資料，就會擲不回任何例外狀況。If no data can be retrieved, no exception will be thrown. 相反地，`false`會傳回。Instead, `false` will be returned. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會判斷資料是否目前儲存在與指定的格式相關聯。The following code example determines whether data currently stored in the is associated with a specified format. 首先，新初始化以指定其格式為文字的字串。First, a new is initialized with a string, specifying its format as text. 然後在查詢與文字格式相關聯的資料指定`autoConvert`參數做為`false`。Then the is queried for data associated with the text format, specifying the `autoConvert` parameter as `false`. 此查詢的結果會列印在文字方塊中。The result of this query is printed in a text box. 然後在查詢的字串格式相關聯的資料指定`autoConvert`參數做為`true`。Then the is queried for data associated with string format, specifying the `autoConvert` parameter as `true`. 結果會列印在文字方塊中。The results are printed in the text box. 此程式碼需要`textBox1`已建立。This code requires that `textBox1` has been created. remarks.format: ## Remarks 檔案的下拉式清單是包含檔案的路徑資訊的字串集合。A file drop list is a collection of strings containing path information for files. 檔案的下拉式清單會儲存在資料物件，做為陣列。A file drop list is stored in a data object as a array. 此方法會將此陣列與，並傳回集合。This method converts this array to a and returns the collection. 使用方法來判斷資料物件是否包含檔案下拉式清單，然後再擷取以這個方法。Use the method to determine whether the data object contains a file drop list before retrieving it with this method. 使用方法，將檔案拖放清單加入至資料物件。Use the method to add a file drop list to the data object.
